text: I further provide that the person named as personal representative serve in this capacity without intervention of the Court and that such personal representative shall have the authority and power to sell at public or private sale as said personal representative deems appropriate any real or personal property of which I may die possessed.

texts: any real or personal property of which I may die possessed
the authority and power to sell at public or private sale as said personal representative deems appropriate any real or personal property of which I may die possessed
the person named as personal representative
